description: Toua is a succesful gambler, and a pitcher in the game One Outs. After losing a game of One Outs for the first time ever to Kojima, he joins the Lycaons with an odd contract, the One Outs contract, that decides Toua`s pay based on his performance. As the Lycaons` famed star pitcher, he can pitch entire games without giving up a single hit.
name: Tokuchi Toua
